mean_en: the state of being uncertain; something that you cannot be sure about; a situation that causes you to be or feel uncertain
sentence: Investing in company stocks will always come with some kind of uncertainty.
sentence_trans: 投资公司股票总是伴随着某种不确定性。
word_etyma: un不 + certain确实的 + ty表名词 → uncertainty不确定，靠不住
